index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF LICENSES AND CONSUMER AFFAIRS
summary: Creating a Dept. of Licenses and Consumer Affairs; providing for the appointment of a Director and defining his duties; providing for the organization and specifying the duties of the License Board of Appeals; establishing, transferring and abolishing certain positions in connection therewith, establishing budget allowances by reappropriation and transfer; making an appropriation from the Emergency Fund and declaring the emergency therefor; transferring records, facilities and equipment to said department; and repealing Ordinances 70328, 99581, and all other ordinances or parts thereof in conflict herewith.
